20110112170031.000|20110112170034.000|TR0|remains in critical condition, but doctors 
20110112170034.000|20110112170036.000|TR0|say she is breathing on her own.

20110112170547.000|20110112170550.000|TR0|time, and actually can go in a negative 
20110112170550.000|20110112170553.000|TR0|fashion and a downward way as well.

20110112171010.000|20110112171012.000|TR0|thinking and actions in the midst of chaos 
20110112171012.000|20110112171015.000|TR0|undoubtedly helped to save Congresswoman 
20110112171015.000|20110112171018.000|TR0|Giffords' life.  We would also like to 
20110112171018.000|20110112171021.000|TR0|personally thank Anna Balast (ph), who 
20110112171021.000|20110112171023.000|TR0|applied pressure to my dad's wounds until 
20110112171023.000|20110112171026.000|TR0|the paramedics arrived.  We are greatly 
20110112171026.000|20110112171029.000|TR0|indebted to her."
20110112171029.000|20110112171031.000|TR0|
20110112171031.000|20110112171034.000|TR0|"My dad has worked in the public sector 
20110112171034.000|20110112171037.000|TR0|for this community for almost 40 years.  
20110112171037.000|20110112171039.000|TR0|He was with the Division of Developmental 
20110112171039.000|20110112171042.000|TR0|Disabilities for 34 years, most of that 
20110112171042.000|20110112171045.000|TR0|time as the director for southern Arizona."
20110112171045.000|20110112171048.000|TR0|
20110112171048.000|20110112171050.000|TR0|"He retired in 2006 and began volunteering 
20110112171050.000|20110112171053.000|TR0|immediately with Gabby's campaign, where 
20110112171053.000|20110112171056.000|TR0|he was the community outreach director.  
20110112171056.000|20110112171058.000|TR0|After her successful election, Gabby 
20110112171058.000|20110112171101.000|TR0|appointed him as her district director."
20110112171101.000|20110112171104.000|TR0|
20110112171104.000|20110112171107.000|TR0|"We knew he worked tirelessly to give a 
20110112171107.000|20110112171109.000|TR0|voice for those who often were not heard 
20110112171109.000|20110112171112.000|TR0|in his career with the Division of 
20110112171112.000|20110112171115.000|TR0|Development Disabilities.  It was hard to 
20110112171115.000|20110112171117.000|TR0|imagine that he could actually work even 
20110112171117.000|20110112171120.000|TR0|more in his new career with Gabby, but 
20110112171120.000|20110112171123.000|TR0|somehow he does."
20110112171123.000|20110112171125.000|TR0|
20110112171125.000|20110112171128.000|TR0|"With such a long career of public service 
20110112171128.000|20110112171131.000|TR0|in this community, he has touched many 
20110112171131.000|20110112171134.000|TR0|lives, and now we are hearing from many of 
20110112171134.000|20110112171136.000|TR0|you who know him well, and some of you who 
20110112171136.000|20110112171139.000|TR0|just knew of him.  He has friends across 
20110112171139.000|20110112171142.000|TR0|the political spectrum and, like his boss, 
20110112171142.000|20110112171144.000|TR0|he just wants to do what is best for the 
20110112171144.000|20110112171147.000|TR0|people of our community.  That is what 
20110112171147.000|20110112171150.000|TR0|drew him to Gabby and that is what binds 
20110112171150.000|20110112171153.000|TR0|them."

20110112171158.000|20110112171201.000|TR0|focus has been on the well-being of Gabby, 
20110112171201.000|20110112171203.000|TR0|and he asks that we all continue to pray 
20110112171203.000|20110112171206.000|TR0|for her recovery and her family."

20110112172427.000|20110112172430.000|TR0|2001.  She was attending the Congress on 
20110112172430.000|20110112172433.000|TR0|the Corner event because she had recently 
20110112172433.000|20110112172435.000|TR0|been elected to her school's student 
20110112172435.000|20110112172438.000|TR0|council.
20110112172438.000|20110112172441.000|TR0|
20110112172441.000|20110112172443.000|TR0|Thirty-year-old Gabe Zimmerman was 
20110112172443.000|20110112172446.000|TR0|recently engaged to be married.  He was 
20110112172446.000|20110112172449.000|TR0|Giffords' director of community outreach.
20110112172449.000|20110112172452.000|TR0|
20110112172452.000|20110112172454.000|TR0|Dorwan Stoddard was shot in the head while

20110112172731.000|20110112172734.000|TR0|SHERIFF JOHN WHETSEL, OKLAHOMA COUNTY, 
20110112172734.000|20110112172737.000|TR0|OKLAHOMA:  Glad to be here, Carol.
20110112172737.000|20110112172739.000|TR0|
20110112172739.000|20110112172742.000|TR0|COSTELLO:  So how will this Dignitary 
20110112172742.000|20110112172745.000|TR0|Protection Unit be set up? How will it 
20110112172745.000|20110112172747.000|TR0|operate?
20110112172747.000|20110112172750.000|TR0|
20110112172750.000|20110112172753.000|TR0|WHETSEL:  Well, we have about 12 deputies 
20110112172753.000|20110112172755.000|TR0|that will be selected this next week and 
20110112172755.000|20110112172758.000|TR0|go through training that the Secret 
20110112172758.000|20110112172801.000|TR0|Service has already offered to us.  We 
20110112172801.000|20110112172804.000|TR0|will make that available to any public 
20110112172804.000|20110112172806.000|TR0|official at any public meeting to make 
20110112172806.000|20110112172809.000|TR0|sure that the public official and the 
20110112172809.000|20110112172812.000|TR0|public are safe, being able to interact 
20110112172812.000|20110112172814.000|TR0|with each other.
20110112172814.000|20110112172817.000|TR0|
20110112172817.000|20110112172820.000|TR0|COSTELLO:  And will this cost you anything?
20110112172820.000|20110112172823.000|TR0|
20110112172823.000|20110112172825.000|TR0|WHETSEL:  No, not really.  The deputies 
20110112172825.000|20110112172828.000|TR0|that we select, this will be in addition 
20110112172828.000|20110112172831.000|TR0|to their normal duties.  These are people 
20110112172831.000|20110112172833.000|TR0|who are volunteering for this assignment.  
20110112172833.000|20110112172836.000|TR0|So it really -- the cost will be very 
20110112172836.000|20110112172839.000|TR0|minimal to our agency.
20110112172839.000|20110112172841.000|TR0|
20110112172841.000|20110112172844.000|TR0|COSTELLO:  Do you find -- I mean, does 
20110112172844.000|20110112172847.000|TR0|your office get many threats against 
20110112172847.000|20110112172850.000|TR0|lawmakers in Oklahoma?
20110112172850.000|20110112172852.000|TR0|
20110112172852.000|20110112172855.000|TR0|WHETSEL:  No, we really don't.  We have in 
20110112172855.000|20110112172858.000|TR0|the past provided deputies for protection 
20110112172858.000|20110112172900.000|TR0|at town meetings.  Oftentimes, we find 
20110112172900.000|20110112172903.000|TR0|that just a uniform has a calming effect 
20110112172903.000|20110112172906.000|TR0|on not only the citizens, but also the 
20110112172906.000|20110112172909.000|TR0|atmosphere and the decorum in the meeting. 
20110112172909.000|20110112172911.000|TR0| So it's not just for the elected official

20110112172919.000|20110112172922.000|TR0|

20110112172925.000|20110112172927.000|TR0|mean, there's a reason you're doing this.  
20110112172927.000|20110112172930.000|TR0|What worries you most now?
20110112172930.000|20110112172933.000|TR0|
20110112172933.000|20110112172936.000|TR0|WHETSEL:  The biggest thing is copycats.  
20110112172936.000|20110112172938.000|TR0|It was very obvious from the shooting 
20110112172938.000|20110112172941.000|TR0|where you have 20 people shot in one

20110112172944.000|20110112172946.000|TR0|easy to get to because they do interact 
20110112172946.000|20110112172949.000|TR0|with the public.
20110112172949.000|20110112172952.000|TR0|

20110112172954.000|20110112172957.000|TR0|the pretty close proximity in time -- the 
20110112172957.000|20110112173000.000|TR0|copycat shooting.  But this is going to be

20110112173632.000|20110112173635.000|TR0|
